name: test-agent
description: Autonomous QA agent that generates, runs, and self-heals unit tests for any JS/TS project using an LLM-first tool-calling architecture

chatParticipants.name: test-agent
chatParticipants.description: Automated test generation agent for any JS/TS project with self-healing capabilities

commands.name: setup
commands.description: Setup Jest testing environment (install dependencies and create config files)

commands.name: install
commands.description: Install Jest dependencies with AI-powered error resolution

commands.name: generate
commands.description: Generate and heal unit tests for a source file

commands.name: generate-all
commands.description: Generate tests for all source files in the workspace

test-agent.maxHealingAttempts.description: Maximum number of attempts to heal a failing test

test-agent.initialBackoffMs.description: Initial backoff time in milliseconds between retry attempts

test-agent.maxRateLimitRetries.description: Maximum number of retries when rate limit is hit

test-agent.maxTokensPerError.description: Maximum number of characters to send from error output to LLM

test-agent.testFilePattern.description: Pattern for generated test file names. Use ${fileName} and ${ext} as placeholders

test-agent.jestCommand.description: Command to execute Jest (e.g., 'npx jest', 'yarn jest', 'pnpm jest')

test-agent.llmProvider.description: LLM provider to use for code generation

test-agent.llmFamily.description: LLM model family (e.g., 'gpt-4', 'gpt-3.5-turbo'). Leave empty to use user's currently selected model.

test-agent.enableTelemetry.description: Enable anonymous telemetry to help improve the extension

test-agent.logLevel.description: Minimum log level to display in the output channel

scripts.clean: node -e "require('fs').rmSync('dist', {recursive: true, force: true})" && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const files=fs.readdirSync('.').filter(f=>f.match(/^spfx-test-agent-.*\.vsix$/)); files.forEach(f=>fs.rmSync(f, {force: true}))"
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.package:vsix: npm run package && npm run vsce:package
scripts.install:vsix: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const vsix=fs.readdirSync('.').find(f=>f.match(/^spfx-test-agent-.*\.vsix$/)); if(vsix) { require('child_process').execSync(`code --install-extension ${vsix}`, {stdio: 'inherit'}); } else { console.error('No VSIX file found'); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && npm run version:patch && npm run package:vsix && npm run install:vsix
